message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the price I'm offering. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $8200. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stick to my budget.
